inputs.name: showTooltip
inputs.description: Whether to show tooltip on hover

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart renders with default props
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: LLMPerformanceChart renders correctly with default configuration

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart renders chart data correctly
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Chart displays data with correct visual representation

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart handles tooltip interactions
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Tooltip appears on hover and displays correct data

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart handles legend interactions
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Legend items can be clicked to toggle data series

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart handles error states gracefully
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Chart shows error boundary when internal error occurs

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart supports X-FILES integration
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: X-FILES trigger icon appears and creates CaseFile when clicked

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart meets accessibility standards
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Chart passes WCAG 2.1 AA compliance tests

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart handles real-time data updates
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Chart updates smoothly when data changes

requiredTests.description: Verify that LLMPerformanceChart implements self-healing capabilities
requiredTests.expectedOutcome: Chart automatically recovers from error states and reports metrics

selfHealing.failureCondition: errorRate > 0.05 for 5m OR renderTime > 100ms for 3m OR accessibilityScore < 0.8 for 10m
selfHealing.repairPrompt: LLMPerformanceChart component v3 has failed self-healing threshold. Error rate: {errorRate}, Accessibility score: {accessibilityScore}, Render time: {renderTime}ms, Data update time: {dataUpdateTime}ms, Chart render time: {chartRenderTime}ms, Interaction count: {interactionCount}. Please analyze the component code, identify the issue, and implement a fix. Ensure all tests pass, X-FILES integration works, real-time updates function properly, and the component meets accessibility standards.
